ygData.subject: Ghoulbane
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I found out that the actual monster that carries Ghoulbane is only 18-20.  Not really sure, but perhaps a bunch of 15s could take em.  When my friends
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I found out that the actual monster that carries Ghoulbane is
only 18-20. Not really sure, but perhaps a bunch of 15s could take em. When
my friends (cleric, ranger, monk) went there they killed him 5 times, he
carried a sword each time and it was rusty each time. What I figure is that
either the killer MUST be a paladin or that the group responsible for the
kill must have a paladin inside it. I have yet to goto Guk, and frankly I
don't look forward to having to dodge the troll bashers, so I am unable to
prove or disprove my two theories.

-Adaron
